spec_data.Name: perl-XML-DOM-XPath
spec_data.Description:
XML::DOM::XPath allows you to use XML::XPath methods to query a DOM. This
is often much easier than relying only on getElementsByTagName.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 06:21:25 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Perl extension to add XPath support to XML::DOM, using XML::XPath engine
